channel.title: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!
channel.description: I know you cannot ask for requests but I need help I have the domain osclient.tk and our actual website is www.orange-scape.com but I put HTML on the website but it says 'Error. Click for details." And the error is: Cannot find 'class.client' I have 'delta_loader.zip' uploaded but how do I like somehow "embed" it into the client so it loads up?

item.title: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

Why would I ‘steal’ Tobex’s loader – we are mean friends.
Thanks again for your post, but how do I upload it to my host
I have a VPS and the domain name is like orangescapeonline.vpscustomer.com but I don’t know what that is.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!

item.title: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!
item.dc:creator: @Multiscape Multiscape
item.description:
@Multiscape wrote:

Hello!

  1. Make new .zip file ‘cache.zip’ and drag the files in your cache folder into it.
  2. Upload ‘cache.zip’ to your host(NO MEGAUPLOAD, MEDIAFIRE ETC.)
  3. Copy the download link e.g. ‘www.example.com/cache.zip’ to your client.class.
  4. Download JARmaker and jar the files in your client folder(no cache) to ‘delta_loader.jar’.
  • REMEMBER TO SET CLIENT.CLASS AS MANIFEST!
  1. Upload ‘delta_loader.jar’ to your host.
  2. Make new html file ‘client.html’.
  3. Make it load the ‘delta_loader.jar’ from url e.g. ‘www.example.com/delta_loader.jar’.

P.S. Have you stolen the tobex’s webclient?

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!

item.title: Webclient === Cannot find 'class.client' only post if you know!
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Does your Site Creator have a FileManager? if so upload your cache to it.

And did you sign your JAR correctly?

Read full topic
